channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road surface at Sixways, 18th February
item.description:
The road surface at Sixways is a mess. Multiple potholes with failed attempts at filling them. This road needs some serious attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Greenway Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter bins broken on London Rd, 18th February
item.description:
The litter bins are both broken on opposite sides of London Rd. One has completely collapsed and the other has a panel missing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 213, London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes still no sign of inspection and has damaged my shock absorber to a point its unsafe to drive my car, 18th February
item.description:
Just up from the housing estate junction on driver's side of left hand lane heading towards shurdington
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: How long will the southbound layby on the A417 be closed ?, 17th February
item.description:
Hi, the southbound layby on the A417 (south of Elmbridge Court rbt) has been closed for many months, if not over a year, and I was wondering why it's closed, and if and when it's due to be re-opened ? It was a large undertaking to build it a few years ago, and it's been closed for much of it's time since then. Thanks !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Streetlight failure, 17th February
item.description:
The streetlight at the turning circle at the end of Criftycraft Lane (by the 'Paddocks') is permanently off making it difficult to use the turning circl4
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Criftycraft Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: It is nearly a year since the temporary lights were put up. There has been no work completed at all since then. When is this going to be resolved? The inconvenience to large volumes of traffic on a daily basis can not be overestimated, 17th February
item.description:
See above. When is this situation going to be resolved? It has been like this for almost a year with no work done at all to remedy the situation
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 267a, London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes appearing and poor repairs, 17th February
item.description:
This part of North Road Westwas recently 'repaired'( I use that term very loosely) Repairs are very poor and the road is already beginning to suffer as well as new potholes appearing near and around the so called repairs. Car are swerving around this area which is very dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Road West, The Reddings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing street tree outside number 19, 17th February
item.description:
The street tree which died outside number 19 on shakespeare road has not been replanted. This seems to be in contravention to the guidance of the conservation area
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Shakespeare Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 213, London Road, Cheltenham

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 17th February
item.description:
There is a nasty pothole in the promenade on the opposite side of quadrangle building in the area in the main carriageway by East India cafe . I would be grateful if it can be sorted asap as it is in a bad place .
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Foul smelling standing water in road drain, 17th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Severn Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
